CONTROLLING AGENT 006     Pg. 1
-------------------------------
         :walk006:      :006:
Key                     Action

ALT  (Button 1)         FIRE
CTRL (Button 0)         JUMP
ARROW KEYS              MOVE

You start in keyboard mode.

Press F1 during the game to
use the joystick, redefine the
keyboard or any other option.

-------------------------------
Press PgUp-PgDn        Esc-Exit
